title: Energy and agriculture
creator_credit: CSIRO, Nicholas Alexander and Chris Oliver
brief_description: Suggests ways of cutting down on energy use in agriculture. Shows how technological change and scientific research can expand the man-on-the-land’s role of producing food energy to the production of liquid fuels such as methanol and ethanol.
description: Suggests ways of cutting down on energy use in agriculture. Shows how technological change and scientific research can expand the man-on-the-land’s role of producing food energy to the production of liquid fuels such as methanol and ethanol.
